Notes: Build successful with Astro 5.17.1 and Cloudflare adapter
Dev server running and single-page app accessible with navigation styles and content working

No dedicated page - only a section in YouTube.astro component on index page. GET /youtube returns 404. Video IDs are unique and not placeholders

Majority responsive with some minor issues on different screen sizes
